name: @maxxton/microdocs-core
description: Shared code for the microdocs-server and microdocs-ui
author: Steven Hermans (s.hermans@maxxton.com)

scripts.compile: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp package.json dist && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp package.json dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json -w
scripts.test: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp package.json dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json && mocha ./dist/**/*.spec.js
